bug.short_desc: dnf update on local rpm does not give missing dep info
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
Running dnf update on a local package does not give enough info and also succeeds when it should not.
``` [root@lorax ~]# curl -O https://kojipkgs.fedoraproject.org//packages/lorax/26.8/1.fc26/x86_64/lorax-26.8-1.fc26.x86_64.rpm % Total % Received % Xferd Average Speed Time Time Time Current Dload Upload Total Spent Left Speed 100 192k 100 192k 0 0 228k 0 --:--:-- --:--:-- --:--:-- 228k [root@lorax ~]# [root@lorax ~]# dnf update ./lorax-26.8-1.fc26.x86_64.rpm Last metadata expiration check: 0:02:02 ago on Wed May 31 17:47:32 2017 UTC. Dependencies resolved. Nothing to do. Complete! [root@lorax ~]# echo $? 0 [root@lorax ~]# rpm -q lorax lorax-26.7-1.fc26.x86_64 [root@lorax ~]# rpm -q dnf dnf-2.4.1-1.fc26.noarch
```
If I ran install instead I get what I expect.
``` [root@lorax ~]# dnf install ./lorax-26.8-1.fc26.x86_64.rpm Last metadata expiration check: 0:04:11 ago on Wed May 31 17:47:32 2017 UTC. Error: package lorax-26.8-1.fc26.x86_64 requires lorax-templates, but none of the providers can be installed - package lorax-templates-generic-26.7-1.fc26.x86_64 requires lorax = 26.7-1.fc26, but none of the providers can be installed - package lorax-templates-generic-26.7-1.fc26.x86_64 requires lorax = 26.7-1.fc26, but none of the providers can be installed - cannot install both lorax-26.8-1.fc26.x86_64 and lorax-26.7-1.fc26.x86_64 - cannot install both lorax-26.8-1.fc26.x86_64 and lorax-26.7-1.fc26.x86_64 - conflicting requests (try to add '--allowerasing' to command line to replace conflicting packages) [root@lorax ~]# echo $? 1 ```
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): dnf-2.4.1-1.fc26.noarch

The problem was solved in dnf-2.5.0-2 that is available in rawhide or fc26 (update-testing repo). Also can be installed from our testing repository (dnf copr enable rpmsoftwaremanagement/dnf-nightly). Please if you will experience the problem with dnf-2.5.0+, don't hesitate to reopen the bug report.

you are correct. output looks much better. Thanks!
``` [root@f26vanilla ~]# dnf update ./lorax-26.8-1.fc26.x86_64.rpm --disablerepo=updates-testing Last metadata expiration check: 0:01:45 ago on Mon Jun 05 16:44:17 2017 UTC. Dependencies resolved.
Problem: package lorax-26.8-1.fc26.x86_64 requires lorax-templates, but none of the providers can be installed - package lorax-templates-generic-26.7-1.fc26.x86_64 requires lorax = 26.7-1.fc26, but none of the providers can be installed - cannot install both lorax-26.8-1.fc26.x86_64 and lorax-26.7-1.fc26.x86_64 - cannot install the best update candidate for package lorax-26.7-1.fc26.x86_64 ============================================================================================================================================================================================================================================ Package Arch Version Repository Size ============================================================================================================================================================================================================================================ Skipping packages with conflicts: (add '--best --allowerasing' to command line to force their upgrade): lorax x86_64 26.7-1.fc26 fedora 193 k lorax x86_64 26.8-1.fc26 @commandline 193 k Skipping packages with broken dependencies: lorax-templates-generic x86_64 26.7-1.fc26 fedora 92 k
Transaction Summary ============================================================================================================================================================================================================================================ Skip 3 Packages
Nothing to do. Complete!
```
